Adélaïde Charlier (amụrụ n'afọ 2000/2001) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe, na otu n'ime ndị na-ahụ na Belgium na-eme ngagharị iwe ụlọ akwụkwọ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe
O so dee nkwupụta maka Guardian. Adélaide dị ka onye otu Fridays For Future, natara onyinye Ambassador of Conscience site na Amnesty International.
Ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Collège Notre-Dame de la Paix na Namur. N'afọ 2019, ya na Anuna De Wever jikọrọ aka mepụta otu Belgian  São Youth for Climate São. Ọ haziri ngagharị ihu igwe na Belgium.
